payload.content: The jump in autonomous coding capability from 30 minutes to two weeks, exemplified by 16 agents coding a working C compiler, represents a phase change rather than a mere trend line.

content: The jump in autonomous coding capability from 30 minutes to two weeks, exemplified by 16 agents coding a working C compiler, represents a phase change rather than a mere trend line.

payload.content: For knowledge workers, the critical question regarding AI adoption has shifted from 'whether to adopt AI' to 'what your agent-to-human ratio should be' and 'what each human needs to be excellent at to make it work'.
